Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier sick customer at Roosevelt. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier sick customer at Roosevelt.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #49 Western & #X49 Western Express Temporary Reroute at Western/Belmont
ShortDescription: 49 Western & X49 Western Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Elston, California, Belmont, Western due to police activity near Western/Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#49 Western & #X49 Western Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Elston, California, Belmont, and Western due to police activity near Western/Belmont.

Allow extra travel time.
